Welcome to the CNRS Formation Entreprise training course

"All-optical control of brain functioning with optogenetics and multi-photon microscopy"

This school will be held at Institut de la Vision, 17 rue Moreau, 75012 Paris

From Monday 10 to Wednesday 19 March 2025

Below is the link to register

https://cnrsformation.cnrs.fr/optical-control-of-brain-functioning-with-optogenetics-and-wave-front-shaping?mc=Emiliani

The price is 2700e and includes meals but housing and travel not included.

Program of the school

Organizers : Valentina Emiliani and Eirini Papagiakoumou
